document_data.caption: A map showing a portion of Seawatch Street and surroundings in the Sea Ward of Waterdeep.
document_data.name: Seawatch Street
document_data.mainbody: '''Seawatch Street''' was a road that was located in the city of [[Waterdeep]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Location: Seawatch Street was located in the western section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Sea Ward|Sea Ward]]. It ran roughly north to south, originating on the western bend of [[Ivory Street]] where it branched south and eventually ended in front of the [[Field of Triumph]] on [[the Lions]]. Seawatch Street also connected with [[Diamond Street]], [[Ignorance Alley]], [[Grimwald's Way]], [[Shark Street]], [[Dob's Loss]], [[Gulzindar Street]], [[Gondwatch Lane]], and [[Wagonslide Alley]].
document_data.Notable Locations:
* [[Dacer's Inn]]
* The [[Fiery Flagon]]
* [[House of Inspired Hands]], a [[Gondar]] temple.
* [[Naingate]]
* [[Tartel's House of the Sword]], a finishing school and secret brothel.<ref>
